references.paper_title: Continuous control with deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduced the Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient (DDPG) algorithm, a foundational off-policy deep reinforcement learning algorithm that is directly compared against in this paper.

references.paper_title: Soft actor-critic: Off-policy maximum entropy deep reinforcement learning with a stochastic actor
references.reason: This paper introduced the Soft Actor-Critic (SAC) algorithm, another important off-policy deep reinforcement learning algorithm that is directly compared against in this paper.

references.paper_title: Addressing function approximation error in actor-critic methods
references.reason: This paper introduced the Twin Delayed Deep Deterministic policy gradient (TD3) algorithm, another important off-policy deep reinforcement learning algorithm that is directly compared against in this paper.
This paper introduced the Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) algorithm, a foundational on-policy deep reinforcement learning algorithm that is directly compared against in this paper.

references.paper_title: Human-level control through deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This is a highly influential paper in deep reinforcement learning that introduced Deep Q-Networks (DQN), which are related to this work and the algorithms compared in this paper.
